attributes.action: ask the Queen to dissolve Parliament forthwith for the sake of the British people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition has been raised because we the people of the UK wish the opportunity to pass judgement on the actions (or in some cases inactions) of our elected representatives at Westminster, of whom we have lost not only confidence but also trust, which in itself is fundemantal for any democracy to operate effectively.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
